General.Name: Sandfire Resources Limited
General.Description: Sandfire Resources Limited, a mining company, engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral tenements and projects. It primarily explores for copper, gold, silver, lead, and zinc deposits. Sandfire Resources Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 10 Kings Park Road, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
